FuncDef:
The pe-vid ce-vid command sets the inner and outer VLAN IDs in generalflow test packets.
The undo pe-vid command deletes VLAN IDs.
By default, no VLAN IDs are set.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the outer VLAN ID in generalflow test packets.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

Specifies the inner VLAN ID in generalflow test packets.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4094.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In generalflow tests, if the simulated inbound interface is a QinQ VLAN tag termination sub-interface, run the pe-vid ce-vid command to set the inner and outer VLAN IDs in test packets.
Prerequisites
The simulated inbound interface has been configured as a QinQ VLAN tag termination sub-interface.
Precautions
You cannot change this configuration of a running test instance.
